amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Community Planning and Development, Housing Opportunities for Persons With AIDS, by $29.1 million and to reduce funding for Information Technology by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Community Planning and Development, Housing Opportunities for Persons With AIDS, by $29.1 million and to reduce funding for Information Technology by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 221 (Roll no. 277).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 221 (Roll no. 277).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Nadler.
